00040 /*************************************************************************/
00041 Sprite* AddObject(void)
00042 {
00043         int i;
00044         for (i = 0; i < OBJECTAMOUNT; i++)
00045         {
00046                 //Find a sprite that is empty
00047                 if (objectList[i].Created != 1)
00048                 {
00049                         printf("Slot %i is now filled\n", i);
00050                         return &objectList[i];
00051                 }
00052         }
00053         return NULL;
00054 }
00055 
00056 /*************************************************************************/
00064 /*************************************************************************/
00065 void AddCollidable(Sprite *newCollidable)
00066 {
00067         int i;
00068         for (i = 0; i < COLLIDEAMOUNT; i++)
00069         {
00070                 //Find a sprite that is empty
00071                 if (collidables[i].Created != 1)
00072                 {
00073                         printf("Slot %i is now collidable\n", i);
00074                         collidables = newCollidable;
00075                         return;
00076                 }
00077         }
00078 }

00080 /*************************************************************************/
00085 /*************************************************************************/
00086 void resetObjectList(void)
00087 {
00088         //Set up the memory to fit the desired amount of objects
00089         objectList  = (Sprite *) calloc(OBJECTAMOUNT, OBJECTAMOUNT * sizeof(Sprite));
00090         //Make sure the calloc is not NULL
00091         if (objectList)
00092         {
00093                 printf("\nOBJECT LIST SET UP COMPLETE\n\n");
00094 
00095                 //Set up collisions
00096                 collideList = (Sprite *) calloc(COLLIDEAMOUNT, COLLIDEAMOUNT * sizeof(Sprite));
00097                 collidables = (Sprite *) calloc(COLLIDEAMOUNT, COLLIDEAMOUNT * sizeof(Sprite));
00098 
00099                 //Make sure the malloc is not NULL
00100                 if (collideList && collidables)
00101                 {
00102                         printf("COLLIDE LIST SET UP COMPLETE\n\n");
00103                 }
00104                 else
00105                 {
00106                         printf("COLLIDE LIST SET UP FAILED\n\n");
00107                 }
00108         }
00109         else
00110         {
00111                 printf("\nOBJECT LIST SET UP FAILED\n\n");
00112         }
00113 }

00115 /*************************************************************************/
00120 /*************************************************************************/
00121 void drawObjectList(void)
00122 {
00123         int currentZ = 0;
00124         int nextZ    = 0;
00125         //Draw the sprites so the highest Z is in front
00126         while (nextZ != -1)
00127         {
00128                 int i;
00129                 nextZ = -1;
00130                 for (i = 0; i < OBJECTAMOUNT; i++)
00131                 {
00132                         Sprite* objectNext = (objectList + i);
00133                         //Make sure the sprite exists
00134                         if (objectNext && objectNext->Created == 1 && objectNext->ZIndex >= currentZ && objectNext->SpriteType != HudType)
00135                         {
00136                                 if (objectNext->ZIndex == currentZ)
00137                                 {
00138                                         DrawSprite(objectNext);
00139                                 }
00140                                 else
00141                                 {
00142                                         if (nextZ == -1 || nextZ > objectNext->ZIndex)
00143                                                 nextZ = objectNext->ZIndex;
00144                                 }
00145                         }
00146                 }
00147                 currentZ = nextZ;
00148         }
00149 }

00151 /*************************************************************************/
00159 /*************************************************************************/
00160 void freeObject(Sprite* objectNext)
00161 {
00162         //Make sure the sprite exists
00163         if (objectNext && objectNext->Created == 1)
00164         {
00165                 //Free the mesh and texture data
00166                 objectNext->Created = 0;
00167                 AEGfxMeshFree(objectNext->SpriteMesh);
00168                 AEGfxTextureUnload(objectNext->SpriteTexture);
00169         }
00170 }
00171 
00172 /*************************************************************************/
00177 /*************************************************************************/
00178 void freeObjectList(void)
00179 {
00180         // Freeing the objects and textures
00181         int i;
00182         for (i = 0; i < OBJECTAMOUNT; i++)
00183         {
00184                 //Make sure the sprite exists
00185                 if (objectList[i].Created == 1)
00186                 {
00187                         //Free the mesh and texture data
00188                         AEGfxMeshFree(objectList[i].SpriteMesh);
00189                         AEGfxTextureUnload(objectList[i].SpriteTexture);
00190                         printf("Slot %i is now empty\n", i);
00191                 }
00192         }
00193         //Free the object list data allocation
00194         free(objectList);
00195         //free(collideList);
00196         //free(collidables);
00197 }
